name: Lotus and Light
description:
Overview

Lotus and Light is a relaxing game about collecting flowers in a misty pond.

Local Storage

Collected flowers are stored in local storage in your browser.  If you play in a new browser or on a new device, you'll have an empty collection to start with.  Clearing your browser cache will also delete your collection.

Words from the Buddha

As a flower that is lovely,
Colorful and fragrant,
Even so fruitful is the well-spoken word
Of one who practices it.
